definition: a special type, to have young animals or reproduce organisms
details:
noun
- a special type
= example: a special type
- a special variety of domesticated animals within a species
= example: a special variety of domesticated animals within a species
= synonyms: strain
verb
- to have young animals or reproduce organisms
= example: to have young animals or reproduce organisms
= synonyms: multiply
- to cause animals to procreate
= example: to cause animals to procreate
- to copulate, used especially of animals
= example: to copulate, used especially of animals
= synonyms: cover
